alert.note: Alert for Hartford (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 1:48PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Hartford County through 245 PM EDT... At 148 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Avon, or over Farmington, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Hartford, New Britain, West Hartford, Bristol, Manchester, East Hartford, Southington, Newington, Windsor, Wethersfield, South Windsor, Farmington, Simsbury, Bloomfield, Avon, Plainville, Suffield, Windsor Locks, Granby and East Windsor. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.
